Module Information

Implemented In:Helpers.js
Dependencies:Core
Author:Jesse Dunlap

Helpers Module¶

The Helpers Module provides various miscellaneous helper functions for use in your app.

P.parseDataURL(string)¶

Parses string (assumed to be a data URL) and returns a Node Buffer.

Note

The shorthand of this function is P.pdu
